name: Active Society for Integrated Development & Management
briefDescription: ASIDEM, is a non-government, non-profit making organization, established in 1st March 2004 and registered under Societies Registration Act 1973. The main aim of establishing the organization is to contribute effectively in the overall development of the society by addressing the social problems like unemployment, women and child health, illiteracy, social evils and decreasing water level. By addressing these problems effectively our society may catch the path of overall development.  The organization strongly believes that if we dream for holistic development of the society than we will have to touch each and every aspect, which effects directly or indirectly to the society and are obstacles in the path of societal development.
